mapper.select: SELECT uu.points currentPoints, (SELECT SUM(uutt.award) FROM uc_user_task_todo uutt WHERE uutt.status=0 AND uutt.userId=uu.id and uutt.awardType = '1') unReceivePoints, NULL taskRange, (SELECT COUNT(1) finishedTaskCount FROM uc_user_task_todo uutt WHERE uutt.status=1 AND uutt.userId = uu.id AND uutt.createTime >=(SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -DAY(CURDATE())+1 DAY)) AND uutt.createTime < (SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE() - DAY(CURDATE()) + 1, INTERVAL 1 MONTH))) finishedTaskCount FROM uc_user uu WHERE uu.id=#{userId}

SELECT a.userId,SUM(a.award) sumPoints FROM (SELECT uutt.userId,uutt.award FROM uc_user_task_todo uutt WHERE uutt.status=1 AND uutt.createTime >= (SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -DAY(CURDATE())+1 DAY)) AND uutt.createTime < (SELECT DATE_ADD(CURDATE() - DAY(CURDATE()) + 1, INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) ) a GROUP BY a.userId ORDER BY sumPoints DESC
